lender.name: kevin
lender.loan_because: I don't want to just do relief work. I want to work in prevention.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a Fair Trade organization, and for a movie that focuses on human trafficking

lender.name: Jon Andre & Crystal
lender.occupation: Offshore crane operator/ Acct. manager & marketing
lender.loan_because: We love to get involved and help others in need. It's great to see how a little can go a long way in changing the lives of others.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur and I understand how much work it takes to get the necessary funding. I also fund because I want to help make dreams come true and I want to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I am a regional manager that leads a consulting practice in Latin America and Caribbean for a major technology provider.

lender.name: Jenny
lender.loan_because: "If we have no peace, it is because we have forgotten that we belong to each other." - Mother Teresa

lender.name: Ryder
lender.loan_because: it reminds me of how little I have to worry about when I think of how far my money will go when used by people in developing nations.
lender.occupational_info: Student

lender.name: Hugh
lender.loan_because: to help someone else help themselves to a better life
lender.occupational_info: I arrange finance for businesss to purchase plant & equipment, motor vehicles, trucks etc

lender.name: Elissa
lender.loan_because: of the possibility that such a small amount of giving can actually help someone to make a difference in their life and their children's life.

lender.name: Patrice
lender.loan_because: These entrepreneurs, who would never be considered by corporate lenders, are worthy of receiving loans and deserve the opportunity to better their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am a wife and a mother raising two teenage daughters. I am a volunteer with the Benevolent Society's Home Visit program, visiting a young family once a week. I also work from home providing office support for my husband.

lender.name: nathalie
lender.loan_because: I believe I am responsible to my fellow men and women who are less fortunate living in underprivileged countries where they may have none or little support from their government.
lender.occupational_info: I organize parties, weddings, dinners for wealthy people who are too busy to do all the work involved in the invitations, decorations, music, entertainment plus organizing food and drinks.

lender.name: SCOTT & JULIE
lender.loan_because: We love the idea of a hand up, We feel we are really helping and that feels great.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: It's not much for me but it can mean a great deal to others, and I can recycle the loan over and over again, thus helping many!!
lender.occupational_info: I manage a health service for people with acute mental health problems on the Central Coast, New South Wales, Australia.

lender.name: Arvind
lender.loan_because: I like helping others help themselves.

lender.name: Lisa Burnside
lender.loan_because: I can and I care.

lender.name: marilyn
lender.loan_because: i believe in all people.

lender.name: Jo-Anne
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Kerrie
lender.loan_because: I feel its a great way to help someone else who is trying their best to help themselves

lender.name: Saurabh
lender.loan_because: I want to help where I can
lender.occupational_info: I keep the machines running that make and bottle Pepsi and Aquafina

lender.name: Maura
lender.loan_because: to give a chance

lender.name: Bryen & Michelle
lender.loan_because: We believe that everyone should be given a chance to improve their lives & that of their families.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: It makes a difference.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because:
I'm sick of watching members of the so-called "first world" frittering away their money on rubbish. Kiva gives me the opportunity to give some direct help, to do something real. I hope to see the money again, but if I don't then at least I've helped someone, that's all that matters. When the funds come back, they will then go to help someone else.
I won't be withdrawing any funds, I'll just wait for some repayments before I reinvest. The funds I have invested will ALWAYS stay with Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: I do my best to fix broken things.

lender.name: Woody & Holly
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a great way to help people and change lives. Too many in the world only see America as its evil, busybody government, not the love filled hearts of typical Americans. Kiva helps change that. We loan money via people borrowing to expand farms and dairys because we are VERY concerned about food shortages with world population growing 75 million a year.
lender.occupational_info: I am a wall street financial money manager in mutual funds. Holly is retired. We live in Maryland & Wyoming. We have 1 adult son lives near Hershey Pa.

lender.name: Thaimaaopas.fi
lender.loan_because: Tourists traveling in Thailand can contribute to well-being of less developed nations. Matkailijat voivat auttaa tätä kautta yritystoimintaa köyhemmissä maissa.
lender.occupational_info: Thailand travel guide. Thaimaa matkaopas.

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: People who work hard deserve to improve their way of life.
lender.occupational_info: My job is to assist people who wish to sell their home or to buy a home to ensure their legal rights are protected. Also to help people who are involved in car crashes by making sure the person at fault pays for car repairs to the person who is innocent. Fishing, for food and gifts.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.occupational_info: I work at the front desk of a veterinary clinic two days a week. I am married and have a baby daughter.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: Its heartwarming and gratifying to see, hear and to believe that so many people are striving towards a common goal. One small match can warm a thousand hearts, but a box can enlighten a globe.
lender.occupational_info: I'm out and about all day servicing the need of others, the one thing that bothers me most, is corporate greed and escalating debt thrust upon the common citizen

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: "God is in the sharing." -Neem Karoli Baba

lender.name: Buster
lender.loan_because: 1 John 3:17
lender.occupational_info: Engaged in economic development and spiritual development

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because:
If I do something to help someone, then hopefully they in turn will do something to help someone else ... you know "pay it forward".
I love the idea of everyday strangers helping each other out with the common goal of making this world a little better.
lender.occupational_info:
I manage an office for a computer visualization company. I take care of the accounting, managing the workforce, and every day office duties.
I am also a very outgoing and social person who loves to be surrounded by fun, family and friends!

lender.name: Fr. Bob
lender.occupational_info: DREAM is a holistic program aimed at preventing the transition of the HIV/AIDS virus from a pregnant woman to her child. It is 98% effective; that is, almost all the children are born HIV-free.

lender.name: Dean
lender.loan_because: Its a way to help others, and when it comes down to it, Because I can.
lender.occupational_info: Field Services Officer

lender.name: Kristy
lender.occupational_info: As a REALTOR, I assist with the selling and buying of real estate.

lender.name: Livia
lender.occupational_info: I help people access information

lender.name: Gina
lender.loan_because: People have reached out to me in times of need -- I believe the only way to repay those who help you is to help others in need.

lender.name: Michele
lender.occupation: stay at home mom; former teacher
lender.loan_because: I am drawn to the stories of people who are working hard to do the best for themselves and their families. How could you not lend a hand when the opportunity presents itself? Lending is a vote for hope and positive change.
lender.occupational_info: Prior to having children, I was a middle school Spanish teacher and then an elementary gifted & talented educator. I now stay home with my 2 small children and continue in a volunteer position as a Gifted Children's Advocate.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Jody
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate to have a decent job and not the daily struggles of so much of the world. I believe everyone should be given a chance and I appreciate how hard so many people in the world work each day just to put food on the table.
lender.occupational_info: I work to bring new medicines to market.

lender.name: Justin
lender.occupational_info: Build websites and other software for a clothing company.

lender.name: Tahir Qureshi
lender.loan_because: I want to help people obtain a better quality of life.

lender.name: Tony
lender.occupation: Real Estate Broker/Owner - Tony Kisivo Realty LLC
lender.loan_because: We all can make the world better by helping each other. Everyone deserves a chance.
lender.occupational_info: I am a real estate Broker in the state of Kansas. I help people that want to sell their homes market them and find the right buyer, and also buyers find the right home to buy and negotiate the right terms.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I want to share my bounty with someone who will make their world better.
lender.occupational_info: As a teacher, I give kids skill sets for lifelong learning. As a musician, I take people on a temporary "down-island" vacation.

lender.name: Marc
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: Natural Science Educator

lender.name: Saundra J
lender.loan_because: I am a small business owner, I have a heart for others struggling to get started.
lender.occupational_info: Manufature cargo liners and sell through catalogs and websites.

lender.name: Kevin & Angela et al
lender.loan_because: We live a great life. Micro-loans are brilliant in their simplicity and allow families, like ours, opportunities to help other families and their communities.
lender.occupational_info: Both of our careers center around helping others achieve their goals.

lender.name: Mariel
lender.loan_because: helping others is the right thing to do.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: Am fortunate enough to be able to help others, and I love learning about other people and parts of the world.

lender.name: Edith
lender.loan_because: Complacency of the world around us is not acceptable.
lender.occupational_info: Joyful.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I feel that evey person can accomplish something if they set thier mind to it
lender.occupational_info: I am a mass mureder and tactition in destroying humanity

lender.name: John F. Kennedy High Denver Geography
John F. Kennedy High Denver Geography
Lorrie
lender.loan_because: It feels god.

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of being able to help an enterprising person move ahead. It's a little thing that I can do that I hope makes a difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: Banking.

lender.name: Pat
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with success and I want to share the blessing

lender.name: karin smith
lender.loan_because: micro loans work! A small amount from each of us makes a huge difference in opportunities for the working poor to support themselves & change their lives and those of their families. It takes so little to do so much!
lender.occupational_info: helping people find homes that meet their needs now and build for their future.

lender.name: Cecile
lender.loan_because: I had always wondered how helping people improve their quality of life. I think Kiva is one of the best answers ever.
lender.occupational_info: I promote low and feasible toxic emission levels from mobile sources in Europe.

lender.name: Blake and Bear
lender.loan_because: It's a very effective way to utilize and maximize extra money. In the spirit of recycling, we can use the same pool of resources over and over again for different purposes with an overall goal of making our world a better place. It's symbiotic and the possibilities are inspiring. Peace, love and all the best to ya!
lender.occupational_info: Blake and Bear are two awesome dogs rescued from the pound.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: I think that everyone deserves chances. Wherther, those chances be first or second. For a job or just to use in life. People should have the opportunities to do what they have drempt of doing all their lives. Such as, getting a good education, having a family, and being able to support you loved ones. So that is why I loan.
lender.occupational_info: I make sandwiches for people that order them. I put meet, cheese, and all the fix-ins on the sub.

lender.name: Daryl
lender.loan_because: In memory of my mother Dorothy Reynolds who in her own small way wanted to help women who were not as well off as she was. This is to celebrate the centenary of here birth on 23/5/1908

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: I just want to help people all over the world who need help.

lender.name: Amy
lender.occupation: international human rights; former Kiva fellow!

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: I am lucky enough to not need like others. I feel it's my job as a human to help those who are not as fortunate.

lender.name: Gary C
lender.loan_because:
I'm lucky enough to be able to.
Even better: as a Kiva Fellow, I get a chance to meet the people I loan to. Pretty cool, huh?
lender.occupational_info: I meet the lenders that you kindly donate to and work with the MFI in Bali, DINARI, to help improve their ability to provide low interest loans.

lender.name: Anne
lender.occupation: Director, Major Gifts, One Economy Corporation
lender.loan_because: it's awesome.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I feel that people should recieve help when they ask for it. I believe that "loaning" is better than "donating" because it promotes self dependency.
lender.occupational_info: One who learns things

lender.name: Will Jin
lender.loan_because: I owe so much to so many.... Kiva provides an excellent channel to give back to the greater society AND for me to observe at a personal level the impact my dollars make on the world.

lender.name: Ursula
lender.loan_because: I like to encourage individual enterprise and support micro-lending

lender.name: Robbie
lender.loan_because: it gives me a chance to give back to those who need it most.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves the chance at providing food, clothing and shelter for themselves and their family.
lender.occupational_info: I am Married and a Mother of 4 Children. I work Part-Time at an Internet Company.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: It works better than giving.
lender.occupational_info: Helping people plan their money

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: People have helped me in the past and I would like to pass that support on. the world is an amazing place and there are people who care out there.
lender.occupational_info: Firstly I am a mother and business owner who studies part time. I love to create beautiful things.

lender.name: Mon, Munch & Mark
lender.loan_because: We love to help those less fortunate.

lender.name: Katharine
lender.loan_because: I appreciate the advantages I have had in life, and want to share them with others
lender.occupational_info: I work on environmentally sustainable business policy for the government

lender.name: Anne & Matthew
lender.loan_because: it's one small step towards redistributing wealth to countries that don't enjoy the level of economic prosperity we take for granted
lender.occupational_info: I work with adults with cystic fibrosis. They have grown up believing they would die before reaching adulthood. Treatments have improved dramatically and they are now living to their 30s and 40s, and for a lucky few, beyond that. They are getting married and having children. I am inspired on a daily basis!

lender.name: Narelle
lender.loan_because: I am so blessed with all that I have, and I want to give back and make the world a better place for others.
lender.occupational_info: My work allows me to travel and meet people and help them to implement systems and changes that make their work easier.

lender.name: Garry
lender.loan_because: I feel it is important to help those who do not have the opportunities that I have
lender.occupational_info: I grow Potaotes, Wheat and Hay for cattle feed.

lender.name: Liz
lender.loan_because: as a Post Graduate Business student in a developed nation I have been privileged to enjoy some of the best education in the world. As a result I know an excellent win-win opportunity when I see one. Giving in this way is not so much a donation as an investment; it's less about providing a handout and more about providing a hand up... that is so appealing to me.
lender.occupational_info: I study business and enterprise while helping my parents run their investment company.

lender.name: Megan & Gareth
lender.loan_because: I've seen the impact these loans can have in improving people's lives and love being able to help make that happen.
lender.occupational_info: I'm studying international development to be able to better fight the causes and consequences of poverty around the world.

lender.name: Giving Griffins
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Mel
lender.loan_because: I believe that those who make an effort to be productive deserve the opportunity to succeed.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: We're all in this together and I like to think others would do the same for me if they were able.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: There is no greater gift than assisting others with reaching there dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a global Information Technology company as a program manager, responsible for the management of large scale activities within a team.

lender.name: jennifer
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good to loan money to people who have little but are working hard to better their life and the lives of their children.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a retail assistant in a Bakery. My Husband and myself own an engineering business and Manage our own superannuation fund.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because:
its a simple and easy way that I can give someone an opportunity to live their dreams and create a better life for them and their families.
"Be the change you want to see in the world"
lender.occupational_info: I am studying to be a lawyer at university.

lender.name: Kristi
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someone's life.

lender.name: Chris
lender.occupation: Teach for America Corps Member / Kiva Fellow
lender.loan_because: I know it works.
lender.occupational_info: During the academic year, I teach elementary math and literacy in a high-need public school in Denver, CO. In the summer of 2008 I served as a Kiva Fellow in Kathmandu, Nepal, and I will be returning to the field this summer.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I worked as a Kiva fellow and saw the value of Kiva's loans on the ground.
lender.occupational_info: I help people and organizations with lots of money make a positive impact on the world by giving their money away to good causes.

lender.name: Maree
lender.loan_because: we all deserve the right be able to empower ourselves & each other to make a difference to our family & community

lender.name: Marco
lender.loan_because: It makes me happy.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I can live without $25 to make someone else's life better.
lender.occupational_info: I learn.

lender.name: Carla
lender.loan_because: I want to show my children that the world is bigger than them.
lender.occupational_info: Training over the internet for the whole world.

lender.name: Carlie
lender.loan_because: I can...

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: even a small loan from me could be life-changing for someone less fortunate.

lender.name: SusanMorgan
lender.loan_because: I am a 13 year old student who is about to celebrate my bat-mitzvah and i wanted to help make another young woman's life better for her and her children

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: It makes sense.

lender.name: Lana
lender.occupational_info: I make my products and sell at a market stall. I would like to help other small entrepreneurs like me.

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.loan_because: I believe in a global community. If my "neighbors" need a helping hand to remain, or become, financially self-sufficient I am delighted to assist.
lender.occupational_info: I work fin Purchasing for a global manufacturing company.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: It feels great to be able to help people who want to help themselves but simply lack access to the necessary funds to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I've been an independant business owner for the past 25 years and enjoy creating and running new businessess.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: I live in an area of the world where I am able to experience many opportunities. It would be amazing if all people in the world were able to pursue opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: Cooking, preparing food. College student. Mother of One

lender.name: Maestra
lender.loan_because: I want to help those that are less fortunate than I am. I also want to teach my students to think about others. There is more happiness in giving than receiving.
lender.occupational_info: Amazing!

lender.name: paula
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: mother

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: We feel fortunate to be in a position to help in some small way to give a hand up when we can.

lender.name: Narrative Images
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: Bernadette and I are photographers out of San Diego CA. We travel and love shooting weddings and other events.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I sell electrical engineering services and products. Power supplies, semiconductor robotics and circuit boards. I also have a guide to bars, nightclubs and restaurants.

lender.name: Jordonna
lender.loan_because: I want to foster hope
lender.occupational_info: I write novels and I work to uphold the civil rights of criminal defendants

lender.name: Shira
lender.loan_because: I hope to pay back a fraction of what I've gained through my travels. I have visited amazing countries with even lovelier people and I am tremendously grateful.

lender.name: Rejane
lender.loan_because: It makes sense.

lender.name: Kelsey
lender.loan_because: I want to make a small difference in the world but a big difference in someone else's life.
lender.occupational_info: I do ultrasounds on mothers who are pregnant to look at the baby.

lender.name: Suzanne
lender.loan_because: it does make a difference

lender.name: Celia
lender.loan_because: everyone at arabianEye wants to give back something to others across the world. It's a lovely antidote to Dubai where people come here to make money. We like to help those who need a loan to increase their quality of life wherever they live. Helping entrepreneurs help themselves is such an amazing idea!
lender.occupational_info: arabianEye is a Middle East visual content provider. We produce and represent the largest stock image collection and award-winning photographers.

lender.name: Jenny and Tony
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone who hasn't had my advantages in life.
lender.occupational_info: I write on all spiritual and paranormal subjects in books and magazines

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I am saving money to buy an apartment and instead of getting like 2% intrest on a bank I put my money here
lender.occupational_info: I am studing engineering and economics.

lender.name: Wou!!
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Jim_Boston_USA
lender.loan_because: Many gentle souls just need a helping hand. An act of kindness & generosity can make the world seem like a brighter place. Knowing that you are not alone, and that there are people who care, fills your life with hope, and allows the human spirit to flourish.
lender.occupational_info: I use ultrasound machines in a hospital to make pictures of the body, so that my patients can receive better medical treatment.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: I want to help others better themselves without becoming dependent on aid.
lender.occupational_info: I design ITsystems

lender.name: Achieve
lender.occupational_info: K-8 charter school

lender.name: fc147140
lender.loan_because: this is a simple way to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I do IT support work, troubleshooting stuff.

lender.name: Abby
lender.loan_because: I think everyone deserves the opportunity to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a compensation consultant, helping clients set pay levels for their employees and design pay programs.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: It gives me great pleasure to be able to help people. Even if it is in a small way. I wish I could do more, that's my only regret.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I believe that helping people achieve self-sufficiency is the best help of all.
lender.occupational_info: Computer Science + Genetics

lender.name: Susannah
lender.occupation: Executive Director of a Non Profit

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: I believe in a hand-up, not a hand out, and I believe in paying forward.

lender.name: Rabbi Asher Knight
lender.loan_because:
The highest form of Tzedakah, charity or distributive justice, involves helping individuals to become self-supporting and self-sufficient.
Rabbi Hillel said: If I am not for myself, who will be for me? If I am only for myself, what am I? If not now, when?
lender.occupational_info: I am the rabbinic liaison to the Social Justice Council and help oversee all Social Justice within the congregation. I also have a full range of rabbinical responsibilities in leading worship, officiating at Life Cycle events, teaching, preaching, counseling and serving as a full member of the synagogue's pastoral team.

lender.name: Jeepers
lender.loan_because: In memory of a well-loved, much-missed pet/family member. I love the idea of helping others to become self-supporting, of teaching them to fish -- and giving them the fishing pole!

lender.name: Ivon
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Marc & Daphnae
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do
lender.occupational_info: Paintings, Carved Stone Sculptures, Stone and Bead Jewelry. Custom stone tributes

lender.name: Shelly
lender.loan_because: I can't change the world but I can change one person's world.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying microfinance, emerging market economies, and social entrepreneurship and hope to put my education to good use in the field.

lender.name: Debbie
lender.loan_because: I want to help other mothers achieve their dreams as I have also been helped.
lender.occupational_info: I work with elderly residents who no longer want to or can't live on their own. Some require very little assistance with daily living and some require more assistance.

lender.name: Bernies_Kids
lender.loan_because: We're a group of people from around the world who met on an internet message board, and decided to give something back.

lender.name: Lydia
lender.loan_because: The success of any business relies not only on the importance of strong financial support, but also on the willingness and compassion of other individuals to help get you there. In addition, I am very blessed to know a wonderful family that have moved to the US from Ghana and am God-Mother to their daughter. They are my true inspiration.
lender.occupational_info: Having traveled and designed for many corporate companies throughout the years, I now translate my concepts and idea's into clothing under my own label. I love the design and development process and that it involves the help of so many people and various countries to achieve the final product.

lender.name: Daniela
lender.loan_because: ... because a little help can go a long way.
lender.occupational_info: I'm specialized in Water Resources Engineering. I help designing levees, bridges, dams and storm water facilities. Kiva helps me doing a bit more of what I love the best, which is... being the best I can by helping others being the best they can!

lender.name: JUDITH
lender.loan_because: hELPING OTHERS TO HELP THEMSELVES CREATES , PERSONAL POWER AND INSPIRATION WHICH HAS A RIPPLE EFFECT.
lender.occupational_info: I AM A PERSONAL EMPOWERMENT COUNSELLOR. i USE A VARIETY OF QUICK AND SIMPLE EFFECTIVE TECHNIQUES THAT HELP PEOPLE TO RELEASE BLOCKAGES TO ACHIEVING THEIR GOALS. ONE TECHNIQUE IS SHOWCASED AT www.EFT.com

lender.name: suzanne
lender.loan_because: It's satisfying to see anyone better their circumstance.

lender.name: tricia
lender.loan_because: "Every human is an artist. And this is the main art that we have: the creation of our story." Don Miguel Ruiz I loan so women can use their art to support themselves and create a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I create multimedia pieces on artists and their works to understand where their art comes from. Creating art is a personal journey and sometimes allows us to discovery so much about ourselves, the world and how we live in it. I am fascinated in learning about other artists, their work, and what is behind them.

lender.name: Mari Fraga Memorial Fund
lender.loan_because:
Hi Everyone. This is a memorial fund for the sweet, wonderful, and amazing person Mariana Fraga or simply 'Mari'. She was an amazing person, a wonderful classmate, a great friend, a loving wife, and so many more great things. As you can see from the picture, she loved food as well as she loved life. I think more can be said here and I encourage all her friends and family to send their thoughts and memories to add here to show the world that Mariana was THE BEST person I ever knew. We will all miss her deeply, and hopefully her memory can live on strongly by using Kiva to give to others.
Mari loved Brazil and did a lot of translations for Mozambique so loans will be chosen to organizations/people there. She also was very thoughtful about gender equality, and I think any projects which help women achieve the equality they deserve would also be in the spirit of her will. Please, feel free to e-mail me kobrien at sfsu . edu and give suggestions for groups to donate to. I started the fund out with $25, but I will soon be adding more and I hope you find it in your hearts to give as well.
*Update: The fund is now made non-withdrawable status in the spirit of it being a memorial fund. Also, I have been asking Kiva to work harder on getting partners in Brazil, but it seems that it is going to take a bit of time (1 year+) so probably this fund will loan to Mozambique and other Latin American countries in the mean time. The loans will go predominantly to female entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info:
Asides from working and graduating with high honors from San Francisco State University, Mariana also volunteered as a translator at Kiva and has done hundreds of translations. Here is a poem written by Mariana that her loving husband Joe shared with us:
Perky
I have this image in my head This really perky girl "Whee!" She is always smiling "Yeah, I am good with anything" She is patient and always answers even the most stupid questions "I think if it's red you should not park there" She always has a positive attitude "But, hey, on the bright side..." She doesn't mind if people misinterpret facts "Well, that's not what I said, but I see why she would say that..." She doesn't mind if everyone is late, or if they never come "Oh, no worries, I know you guys are busy..." She never speaks ill of anyone "Well, you have to try to put yourself in her shoes..."
So I try to be that way.
But sometimes it's really fucking hard.

lender.name: Hunter & Giada
lender.occupational_info: discovering the world and teaching our parents our unique perspective

lender.name: Nic Morgan
lender.loan_because: I can, and it's obvious that everyone should.
lender.occupational_info: Our company is trying to make solar power more affordable.

lender.name: moom
lender.loan_because: "Sei que o meu trabalho é uma gota no oceano, mas sem ele, o oceano seria menor." - Madre Teresa de Calcutá

lender.name: Glen Shewchuck

I learned about livelihoods with an organization called Akshara Networks. See the website below and learn some nice things about development work.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers, currently for non-profits and NGOs.

lender.loan_because: Sharing a little of our wealth could really change the world. It's changing it, loan by loan.
lender.occupational_info: I Teach computing in a school of architecture. I am currently working on my PHD thesis.

lender.loan_because: Kiva is a wonderful opportunity to make a difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: Computer Science Teacher

lender.loan_because: I believe in the idea of helping those in need help themselves to a better life.

lender.loan_because: I want to make poverty history!

lender.name: Lindsay
lender.loan_because: It is one of the easiest and successful ways to help those in need.
lender.occupational_info: I am going to school for a degree in Political Science. I hope to find a job where I am able to help people.

lender.name: Kelsey
lender.loan_because: I have more than enough stuff. I would rather have a Kiva gift certificate so I can help someone who really needs it.
lender.occupational_info: Entering 10th grade high school in 2008. Some day I hope to have a job where I can help other people.

lender.name: Karina
lender.occupational_info: I work to improve the health care system in the United States

lender.name: Bill
lender.occupational_info: I am a photojournalist in Washington, DC, covering the U.S. Congress and politics for a newspaper.

lender.name: Geoff & Valerie
lender.loan_because: My wife and I saw a segment on Frontline about the work KIVA is doing. We have been looking for ways to help people out. KIVA seems to be an ideal way to make a difference.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: I admire individuals who strive to better the lives of their families.
lender.occupational_info: Medical Student

lender.name: Shannon
lender.loan_because: The obvious reason is to help people, but mostly it is to demonstrate to my son a lot can be done with just a little effort.
lender.occupational_info: Social work in a medical setting. I have a highly rewarding job.

lender.name: Annie
lender.loan_because: Having been blessed with a certain amount of success in my own business endeavors, I feel it is only right to help others in theirs. I feel a personal connection with the people of Southeast Asia; they treated me with respect and kindness many years ago, and now is my time to return the favor.
lender.occupational_info: Our shop specializes in the repair and rebuilding of manual and automatic transmissions and all-wheel drive transfer cases in all makes and models of passenger cars and trucks. We also repair and replace clutch assemblies in the same vehicles. Annie, whose picture appears on this page, was our friend and helper, and has passed on to a better place; she is greatly missed.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I've travelled to developing nations and gotten to know a few very hardworking people whose lives can be improved dramatically with just a little effort and sacrifice on my part.
lender.occupational_info: I have two businesses. First, I help other business people develop their businesses. I also redevelop and renovate older houses and resell them.

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to live without the worry of money and to enjoy what you do for a living. This world will be a better place when we all help each other out.
lender.occupational_info: I work with a company that provides learning materials to local schools so that the students can create art and music.

lender.name: Curtis
lender.loan_because: After our recent honeymoon in Mauritius where we saw how people live in third world countries, it really hit home how much we have and how easy it is for us to not only survive but live in abundance compared to others around the world. I enjoy giving to those less fortunate because it means they can experience even a small piece of what we have.
lender.occupational_info: I enjoy spending time with my new wife, fine wines, fast cars and quality movies.

lender.name: Cori
lender.loan_because:
When you can, you should...
At the end of the day, it's about what you've done and not what you have...
lender.occupational_info: Stressful, but rewarding.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I want to help others

lender.name: Howie
lender.loan_because:
It's the right thing to do...
KIVA is the perfect site for someone who wants to reach out to people around the world and offer assistance....but assistance specifically to people who are trying to make their lives and other lives better.....
lender.occupational_info: I solve problems...

lender.name: Peace & Prosperity
lender.whereabouts: Land of the Free Home of the Brave
lender.loan_because: The World needs as many people as possible growing food to feed others; and for some, it's hard to have Hope on an empty stomach.

lender.name: Elle-May
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a fantastic Idea, The best way to help!
lender.occupational_info: I raise funds for charity in a call center.

lender.name: Helena
lender.loan_because: It is fun. I also feel like I was born to help other people.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student; and I work at Starbucks.

lender.name: Paul N
lender.loan_because: I believe in making the world a better place by what ever maeger means I can afford.

lender.occupational_info: I write programs for computers to help utility companies bill their customers easily and effectively. I also help build websites.

lender.name: Ewi
lender.loan_because: I love Jesus

lender.name: Debbie and Chris

lender.name: Patricia Bacarella
lender.loan_because: "No act of kindness, no matter how small, is ever wasted." — Aesop

lender.name: CandiFLA
lender.loan_because: hi, i'm bart simpson, who the hell are you?
lender.occupational_info:
. . . 53 countries loaned =============== Afghanistan  Armenia  Azerbaijan  Benin  Bolivia  Bosnia and Herzegovina  Burundi (2)  Cambodia  Cameroon  Chile  Colombia  Costa Rica  Democratic Republic of the Congo  Dominican Republic  Ecuador  El Salvador  Ghana (2)  Guatemala  Haiti  Honduras  Indonesia  Iraq  Kenya  Kyrgyzstan  Lebanon  Liberia  Mali  Mexico  Moldova  Mongolia  Mozambique  Nepal  Nicaragua  Nigeria  Pakistan  Palestine (2)  Paraguay  Peru  Philippines  Rwanda  Samoa  Senegal  Sierra Leone  South Sudan  Sri Lanka  Tajikistan  Tanzania  Togo  Uganda  Ukraine  USA  Vietnam (2)  Zimbabwe
4 countries missed ============== Bulgaria  Chad  Cote D'Ivoire  Gaza . . . Funny, the loan to a US borrower defaulted. Last time i lend to my own country. . . .

lender.name: Virginia
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. In the words of Muhammad Yunas, poverty and humanity should not co-exist.
lender.occupational_info: I co-own Fundamental Training Solutions with my business partner, Dina Cipollaro. We specialize in leadership and customer service training.

lender.name: Ariel
lender.loan_because: I believe that empowering individuals is the key to long-term success and because something that is a small sum to me can make a big change elsewhere
lender.occupational_info: I am in charge of a computer department for a Telecommunications equipment manufacturer.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I am able, and I want to make a difference to those in need.

lender.name: Beverly & Greg
lender.loan_because: Jesus invested in people and set an example to us.
lender.occupational_info: Greg is a physician assistant, which is like a doctor. Beverly is a homemaker. We have 3 children, ages 9 to 17.

lender.loan_because: I am blessed with a good life and want to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I have an online business that sells plus size lingerie. We believe that everyone deserves beautiful things regardless of their size.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Henrik

lender.occupational_info: Helping online internet business become secure

lender.name: Jodie
lender.loan_because: I believe that when we give we get so much more back. It is just good Karma
lender.occupational_info: I help my country run smoothly

lender.name: Helen
lender.loan_because: I feel it is much more valuable to help people create a sustainable business to support themselves and their familes. It also provides people with an opportunity to have purpose in their lives which is something we all need.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a multicultural non-profit organisation that provides a variety of services to help migrants and refugees settle in Australia.

lender.name: Vince
lender.loan_because: small entrepreneurs are the unsung hero’s of the world. entrepreneurs are hard working and proud people that don’t want charity but do require small loans to help start and expand a business. Whilst the banking system will lend billions to so called “safe companies” they will not lend to small businesses which in most cases have a far better chance of repaying.
lender.occupational_info: I trade financial markets as well as teaching others.

lender.loan_because: i studied in finance and i'm convince that microfinance is the future of this world.

lender.occupational_info: We create IT applications that people like you can use for their daily work or personal activities and I am responsible for making sure everything goes well!

lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Terry
lender.loan_because: It is my personal "Foreign Policy". I try to support people involved in food production - typically agriculture, poultry, or fish. I figure this helps the borrower make some money while helping to feed the people around them.

lender.name: Sophia
lender.loan_because:
“In the present circumstances, no one can afford to assume that someone else will solve their problems. Every individual has a responsibility to help guide our global family in the right direction. Good wishes are not sufficient; we must become actively engaged.”
- HH the Dalai Lama

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: I'd like to assist other people's small businesses grow.
lender.occupational_info: I work on concerts with musicians and singers.

lender.name: Kayla

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: We're all in this together on this planet, so we all rise or fall together.
lender.occupational_info: I am a writing teacher. I teach university students to write clearly, think logically, and to understand how their actions and choices can influence others.

lender.occupational_info: I help people who sell clothing lend money to their customers, so they can buy clothes for their families.

lender.loan_because: This is a good way to help people and communities with dignity

lender.name: Julie

lender.occupational_info: By day I work with computers, by night I work with the heart.

lender.name: Kaya Casper
lender.loan_because: I contribute to microloans through Kiva because I believe in empowering people to provide for themselves and their families via entrepreneurship.

lender.name: Jo L.
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I can make a difference by working with others
lender.occupational_info: I work with schools in my county of Lincolnshire and several countries encouraging, supporting and facilitating the development of international school partnerships and projects

lender.name: Ray
lender.loan_because: I believe in micro loans as a way to empower other people
lender.occupational_info: I write computer programs that automate repetitious tasks, helping make people's jobs easier (if I do my work successfully)

lender.name: Dodd
lender.loan_because: Mercy to the needy is a loan to God, and God pays back those loans in full. (Proverbs 19:17)

lender.name: Mezhgan
lender.loan_because: Passion to help women and children.

lender.name: The Dudgeons
lender.loan_because: Our money can do so much more good in other places in the world than it can here at home right now. By loaning instead of gifting, we can help more people with the same money.

lender.name: Angie, David & girls
lender.loan_because: We want to share what we have been blessed with and it feels great to help other people to be able to take care of their families
lender.occupational_info: Dad is a designer and Mom stays home and takes care of the little daughter, 4, and the older daughter, 7, goes to school.

lender.name: Martha
lender.loan_because: Yoga has shown me the way to be of service to others and Kiva has provided me with an incredible tool to be of service to others through their organization. I truly feel a part of our world!
lender.occupational_info: I teach yoga to others in order to help them live a better life physically, mentally, emotionally, and spiritually. Just passing on what yoga has done for me.

lender.name: gurmohan
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel like i am part of this world and i am helping my extended family
lender.occupational_info: i am newsagent

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: Someone else probably needs the money more than me
lender.occupational_info: I coordinate a program for young adult with developmental disabilities

lender.name: Jennifer L
lender.loan_because: I am grateful for the opportunities and helpful people I have had in my life. I wish to help create opportunities for others.
lender.occupational_info: I am an xray technologist at a busy hospital.

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: I am so happy to be a part of empowering people to reach their dreams. I also love how different people all around the world can join together to help someone else.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: i'm learning about how sharing my good fortune with others helps to make the world a better place.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: in order to keep it you have to give it away.
